posts.post_content:
Hi all. I have a small block of Brown Hindu's I was looking to sell or trade. I am looking for $3200 or so for the group as a whole and prefer to move them at once. In my opinion, the group presents much nicer than the technical grades. Please let me know if you have any interest. Thank you very much for your time.

1.) McGraw-portrait no cap SGC 10 1
2.) Clarke-holding bat SGC A
3.) Marquard-hands at thighs SGC 10 1
4.) Guiheen-SL SGC 10 1
5.) Bell-hands above head SGC 30 2
6.) Pelty-horizontal SGC 10 1
7.) Wagner-bat on left shoulder SGC 10 1
8.) Bowerman SGC 10 1
If you decide to sell individually I would be interested in the Clarke
If you decide to sell individually I would be interested in the Bowerman.
As you already know, I'll take Guiheen-SL SGC 10 1 if/when you decide to break up the group. :)
If you break up the lot, I'll see if we can work anything out about the Bell, or any other cards that are unclaimed.

I have to say, this site offers a much more fun and intimate setting than Ebay. Very cool. 

Here is the scoop guys, it is my hope to move them all in one block just for convenience sake. However, if for some reason there is no match to be found, I would be willing to break them up. 

I suppose the best route to start off would be if you could submit offers to me via PM for the particular piece you are interested in. Again, thank you for your interest guys. I do appreciate it.

Here are some pictures. I am sorry the quality is so awful, but it is the best I can do for the time being. The quality and eye appeal of these cards is much better in person, I can say this with absolute certainty.
Well, never mind, the site cannot handle the file size ... let me know if you want to see some pictures and I will email them. Thanks.

You should resize the pictures and post them. They do need to be about 80k or less. I have to leave to a softball game and won't be back until around 11pm tonight but if you want to send them to me I will resize and post them for you. If you do, please send them to [url]leonl@flash.net[/url]  .......good luck (looks like you might be able to sell them all singly if you don't find a buyer for the group)
I'd be interestead in McGraw or Guiheen

Leon,

Thank you man. That is a real generous offer from you. I appreciate the hospitality. Thank you.
Is the same group from mr Towle???
I have no clue what you are saying here ... what?

I think Andrew is asking if this is the same group referenced in this thread: [url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=154966[/url] though I don't see a Lake in your listing.

DJ
Oh, I understand. Thank you for clarifying. No, this is not the same group. I bought these from a friend. Thanks.

I am sorry for the delay, but I finally got scans for all of you who requested them. I apologize for the delay, and in reality should not have posted this listing without pictures. Anyways, here they are for those of you who wrote me.  Thank you.

The Fred Clarke is authentic because of a slight trim at the very bottom of the card, though the name and team etc. are still fully present. On the back of the McGraw, you may notice some writing. It has stamped on it "Fredrick Benedict Gessner" and in cursive it says "Princeton". Thanks.
The items was Mr. Towle are in a seperate thread from myself...

As I mentioned, it was my preference to sell the group at once, but thus far, every single person who has written me has asked if I will split up the cards and has requested individual pieces. In other words, the people have spoken. Feel free to start sending offers on which piece(s) you want via PM and we can go from there. Thanks.

Derek

Guiheen sold. Thank you very much.

Derek
I almost forgot, exotic trades still to be considered. Thanks :)
Pelty sold. Thank you very much.

Guiheen and Pelty are sold. Still available are:

1.) McGraw-portrait no cap SGC 10 1
2.) Clarke-holding bat SGC A
3.) Marquard-hands at thighs SGC 10 1
4.) Bell-hands above head SGC 30 2
5.) Wagner-bat on left shoulder SGC 10 1
6.) Bowerman SGC 10 1

As always, exotic trades to be considered as well. Thank you very much.
"Bump". I am looking to move the remaining six cards at once to anyone who is interested. Also, I have an attractive Rube Waddell portrait w/ a Hindu back graded a PSA 1 if anyone is interested.

sent. Also interested in the Wagner.

Thanks
I will try to get some better pics up of all of the cards in the next few days. I have to wait until I see my sister because she has the camera. Thank you for your patience everyone.

I was finally able to have my sister take some good pictures for me. For all of you who have been writing, I am sorry it took so long, and I thank you for your patience.

The writing on the McGraw reads "Fredrick Benedict Gessner" and in cursive he writes "Princeton". There is a small trim at the bottom of the Clarke card.

Thanks!

"BUMP"

Looking for $3000 for the group of 7, which includes 4 solid HOF. I am willing to listen to offers or potential trades. Thanks!
Doing a "bump". Still fielding offers.
labor day "bump"
bump ... still taking offers
bump... i have hindu's ... you want them ... lets make a deal :)
bump ... make offers ...
